data.name: Attach
data.value: Attempting to attach to the nanoDevice for debugging...

data.name: AttachFailed
data.value: Attach failed.

data.name: AttachFailedProcessDied
data.value: Attach failed because an internal error caused the process to terminate.

data.name: AttachingToDevice
data.value: Attaching to nanoDevice...

data.name: BogusCorDebugProcess
data.value: CorDebugProcess not properly initialized (m_pid == 0)

data.name: CouldNotReconnect
data.value: Could not reconnect to the debugging target after rebooting it.

data.name: DebugEngineAttachmentFailure
data.value: Debugger engine could not attach to the nanoDevice target.

data.name: DebuggerThreadTerminated
data.value: The debugger engine thread has terminated unexpectedly with error '{0}'.

data.name: DebuggingStarting
data.value: nanoDevice debugging starting...

data.name: DebuggingTargetNotFound
data.value: The nanoDevice target could not be found.

data.name: DeploymentErrorDeviceErrors
data.value: Deployment error: the debugging failed to initialize because of device errors.

data.name: DeploymentErrorReconnect
data.value: Deployment error: failed to (re)connect debugger engine to nanoDevice target.

data.name: DeviceFound
data.value: Device "{0}" identified

data.name: DeviceInitializationTimeout
data.value: ERROR: Timeout waiting for nanoDevice to leave initialization state. Try reset the device and reconnect in Device Explorer tool window.

data.name: DeviceInitialized
data.value: nanoDevice is initialized

data.name: DeviceNotFound
data.value: Device "{0}" was not found

data.name: DispatchEvents
data.value: The debugger engine is listening to debug events from the nanoDevice target

data.name: DispatchEventsFailed
data.value: The debugger engine failed to receive any debug events from the nanoDevice target

data.name: EraseTargetDeploymentFailed
data.value: Failed to erase deployment area of target device.

data.name: InitializationFailed
data.value: The nanoDevice target and the debugger engine failed to initialize because of unspecified device errors.

data.name: InitializeProcessFailed
data.value: The initialization of the debugging process failed.

data.name: InitializeProcessFailedProcessDied
data.value: The initialization of the debugging process failed because an internal error caused the process to terminate.

data.name: LoadAssemblies
data.value: The nanoDevice runtime is loading the application assemblies and starting execution.

data.name: LoadedAssembliesInformation
data.value: Updating information about assemblies on the debugging target.

data.name: Rebooting
data.value: The debugging target is not in an initialized state; rebooting...

data.name: RunningThreadsInformation
data.value: Updating thread list

data.name: StartDeviceSearch
data.value: Waiting for the nanoDevice target {0} to connect to the debugger engine...

data.name: TargetInitializeSuccess
data.value: The nanoDevice target initialized successfully.

data.name: WaitingDeviceInitialization
data.value: Waiting for nanoDevice to initialize...
